thread.title: U.S. sending troops to Cameroon to monitor Boko Haram
thread.title_full: Video: U.S. sending troops to Cameroon to monitor Boko Haram | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: U.S. sending troops to Cameroon to monitor Boko Haram
text: A series of suicide bombings rocked Nigeria today. They come as the Obama administration announced 300 U.S. soldiers would be sent to neighboring Cameroon. For more on the situation, Hari Sreenivasan speaks to Peter Pham of the Atlantic Council.
